channel.title: Spencer Tweedy
channel.description: I play drums and work on music projects.

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description:
You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead and edit it and re-build the site to see your changes. You can rebuild the site in many different ways, but the most common way is to run jekyll serve, which launches a web server and auto-regenerates your site when a file is updated.

To add new posts, simply add a file in the _posts directory that follows the convention YYYY-MM-DD-name-of-post.ext and includes the necessary front matter. Take a look at the source for this post to get an idea about how it works.

Jekyll also offers powerful support for code snippets:

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll Talk.

item.title: tweedy the band is headed to australia new
item.description:
Tweedy (the band) is headed to Australia, New Zealand, and Japan!!!

March 20 - Meeniyan Town Hall - Meeniyan, AUS (SOLD OUT) March 21 - Melbourne Recital Centre - Melbourne, AUS March 22 - Factory Theatre - Sydney, AUS March 24 - Bluesfest Byron Bay - Byron Bay, AUS March 25 - Bluesfest - Byron Bay, AUS March 27 - Powerstation - Auckland, NZL March 30 - Liquidroom - Tokyo, JPN March 31 - Quattro - Osaka, JPN Tickets available at wilcoworld.net/shows.

item.title: tweedy got to play on the cbs this morning show
item.description: Tweedy got to play on the CBS This Morning show last weekend. We played three songs (including “Diamond Light”) and they interviewed Sammy, my mom, my dad and me. You can watch the whole segment in pieces here.

item.title: 04 Tweedy
item.description: I got interviewed by Jonah Luke for his new podcast, The Myth of Fingerprints. You can listen to it here.

item.title: that was a fun week next up 2017
item.description:
Wilco at Solid Sound ‘‘15That was a fun week.

Next up, 2017…
